temple_syntax_kill_1.name: Purge the Unholy
temple_syntax_kill_1.talk_prompt: The crypts beneath us stir. Normal steel passes through these shades harmlessly. You must use the 'Divine Wrath' (Spell 1031) to banish them.
temple_syntax_kill_1.progress_prompt: The shades still linger. Remember, use holy magic.
temple_syntax_kill_1.reward_message: The Commander nods grimly. 'The light has prevailed. Well done.'

temple_social_1.name: A Crisis of Faith
temple_social_1.talk_prompt: There is a refugee in the Almonry who refuses to eat, believing himself forsaken. Words of kindness are needed, not miracles. PLEAD with him to restore his hope.
temple_social_1.progress_prompt: He still despairs. You must reach his heart.
temple_social_1.reward_message: The High Priest smiles warmly. 'He has taken bread. You have saved a soul today.'

temple_burden_1.name: The Weight of Sin
temple_burden_1.talk_prompt: This reliquary contains the ashes of a traitor. It is heavy with sin (HEAVY) and anchors the soul (NO_PORTAL). Carry it to the Crypt below and place it in an empty sarcophagus.
temple_burden_1.progress_prompt: The task is heavy, I know. But it must be done.
temple_burden_1.reward_message: The High Priest bows. 'The burden is lifted. You have walked a hard path.'

temple_cartographer_1.name: Stations of the Sun
temple_cartographer_1.talk_prompt: To understand the Temple, one must walk its full measure. Visit the Nave, the Almonry, the Solar, and the Crypt. Reflect on each.
temple_cartographer_1.progress_prompt: You have not yet visited all the holy stations.
temple_cartographer_1.reward_message: The High Priest nods. 'You have seen the cycle of life and death within these walls. You understand us better now.'

temple_ghost_walk_1.name: The Silent Vigil
temple_ghost_walk_1.talk_prompt: The Sun Vault is guarded by constructs that sense vibration. You must prove your discipline. Enter the vault, but do not wake the guardians. You must be SNEAKING.
temple_ghost_walk_1.reward_message: The Commander looks impressed. 'Not a sound. You move like a shadow in the light.'
